item.title: Digital RMB: Revolutionary Technology or Not?
item.description: After the pilot of e-CNY was rolled out in 10 cities across China in August of 2021, news outlets all over the world swarmed to cover the new burgeoning technology[8]. After the initial buzz of the pilot died down, one question many people in China and the international media had on their minds was whether e-CNY was truly going to be the disruptive revolutionary technology that the Peopleâ€™s Bank of China (PBOC) wants it to be.
